name: Cityscapes (modified ResNet-101)
description: DeepLabV3+ semantic segmentation model, trained on ImageNet and Cityscapes.
author: facebook, inc.
citation_info:
DeepLabV3+:

Chen, L.C., Zhu, Y., Papandreou, G., Schroff, F. and Adam, H., 2018. Encoder-decoder with atrous separable convolution for semantic image segmentation. In Proceedings of the European conference on computer vision (ECCV) (pp. 801-818).


Cityscapes dataset:

Cordts, M., Omran, M., Ramos, S., Rehfeld, T., Enzweiler, M., Benenson, R., Franke, U., Roth, S. and Schiele, B., 2016. The cityscapes dataset for semantic urban scene understanding. In Proceedings of the IEEE conference on computer vision and pattern recognition (pp. 3213-3223).
